title: Eyebite
content:
ures to sleep.

While Concentrating, you may cast Eyebite without expending a spell slot.

18mWIS Save Concentration Long Rest

Eyebite is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Eyebite is a Lvl 6 Spell from the Necromancy school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Eyebite Information

Description: Your eyes become black corridors walled in teeth, your gaze capable of inflicting dread, sickness, or putting creatures
